name: OperationOutcome.issue.expression
title: OperationOutcome.issue.expression
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: FHIRPath of element(s) related to issue
element.definition: A [simple subset of FHIRPath](fhirpath.html#simple) limited to element names, repetition indicators and the default child accessor that identifies one of the elements in the resource that caused this issue to be raised.
element.comment: The root of the FHIRPath is the resource or bundle that generated OperationOutcome.  Each FHIRPath SHALL resolve to a single node.
element.requirements: Allows systems to highlight or otherwise guide users to elements implicated in issues to allow them to be fixed more easily.
